trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting"></xref> event or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que irá processar a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting"> </xref> eventos ou <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A> method, and it signals that the connection process has begun (for example, a user has selected a control and clicked a connect verb), but is not yet completed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>o evento é gerado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A>método, e indica que o processo de ligação começou (por exemplo, um utilizador tiver selecionado um controlo e clicado um verbo connect), mas ainda não foi concluído.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>

trans-unit.source: The event provides an opportunity to cancel a connection before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: O evento fornece uma oportunidade para cancelar uma ligação antes de terminar.

trans-unit.source: If the connection is successfully completed, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event.
trans-unit.target: Se a ligação for concluída com êxito, este evento é seguido de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A> method, and it signals the fact that a user has clicked a disconnect verb, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method has otherwise been called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>o evento é gerado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A>método e sinalizar o facto de que um utilizador tiver clicado um verbo desligar, ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>método caso contrário, ter sido chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>

trans-unit.source: The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process of ending a connection before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: O evento fornece uma oportunidade para cancelar o processo de terminar uma ligação antes de terminar.

trans-unit.source: If the connection is ended successfully, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event.
trans-unit.target: Se a ligação é terminada com êxito, este evento é seguido de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler delegate is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O método especificado no delegado WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler é chamado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add custom handlers for the events by adding the `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` and `OnWebPartsConnecting` attributes to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning custom method names to the attributes.
trans-unit.target: Os programadores de página podem adicionar processadores personalizados para os eventos adicionando o `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` e `OnWebPartsConnecting` atributos para o `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento e a atribuição de nomes do método personalizado para os atributos.

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Também pode ser atribuído um processador personalizado através de programação.

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a atribuição de forma programática um processador de eventos, consulte [NIB: como: ligar métodos de processador de eventos para eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
